headline: FCC DADDY 👮‍♂️📺 SMACKS BBC 🤡🇬🇧 with LOVE LETTER 💌🔥 over TRUMP SPEECH SNIP-SNIP ✂️😡 – DID AUNTIE FAKE THE ORANGE MAN'S WORDS? 🥊🇺🇸
text:
YO FCC BOSS BRENDAN CARR 🕵️‍♂️💼 dropping BOMBS 💣📨 on BBC SIMPS 🤡📺! Wrote a THICC 💌 letter to outgoing DG TIM DAVIE 👨‍💼🚪 and NPR/PBS HOMIES 🇺🇸📡 cuz PANORAMA EP 'TRUMP: A SECOND CHANCE?' ✂️🎬 spliced DONNIE'S 2021 RALLY RANT 🗣️🔥 like a BAD TIKTOK EDIT 😩📱! They stitched 'We're gonna WALK DOWN to the CAPITOL 🏛️🚶‍♂️... and WE FIGHT like HELL 👊😈' – but IRL those bits were 50+ MINS APART ⏰😂 – making ORANGE DADDY 👑🍊 look like CAPITOL RIOT KING 👑🔥 on JAN 6! BBC said 'OOPSIE 🙈💦 gave WRONG VIBE that TRUMP called for VIOLENCE 😱🔪' and APOLOGISED 🤦‍♀️🙏 but NO CASH to DONNIE'S $1-5BN LAWSUIT THREAT 💰⚖️!

CARR SNITCHING 🔥: 'BBC cooked up a FAKE SENTENCE TRUMP NEVER SAID 🗣️❌ – that's NEWS DISTORTION 🚫📰 and BROADCAST HOAX 🤡📺 straight outta FCC RULEBOOK 📜🚨!' Wants deets if BBC fed that JUICY EDIT 🍑✂️ to US STATIONS aired by NPR/PBS 🖥️🇺🇸. BBC clapping back 👏😤: 'NO RIGHTS, NO US DROPS 🚫🇺🇸, iPLAYER LOCKED to UK PLEBS 🇬🇧🔒!' Even said EP DIDN'T HURT DONNIE cuz he WON 2024 ELECTION 🏆🚀 like a BOSS despite the DRAMA 💅!

TRUMP RAGING 😡🔥 to REPORTERS: 'They CHEATED 🕵️‍♂️, CHANGED WORDS from MY MOUTH 👄❌ – I GOTTA SUE ‼️ $BNs incoming!' Rumors he YAPPED to UK PM KEIR STARMER 🤝🇬🇧 about BBC BULLSH*T last weekend – deets DRY AF 🏜️😴. EP dropped PRE-ELECTION 📺🗳️ but BBC YANKED it FOREVER 🚫🔒 no re-runs bby!

SPILLED by DAILY TELEGRAPH 📰🔍 via LEAKED BBC MEMO from MICHAEL PRESCOTT 🕵️‍♂️📝 – dude ROASTED other BBC SLOPPY JOES 🍔🤢! TIM DAVIE + DEBORAH TURNESS 👨‍💼👩‍💼 BOUNCED outta jobs 🚪💨 mid-furore! UK LAWYER MARK STEPHENS 😂⚖️: 'TRUMP TEAM fishing for FCC JURISDICTION 🐟🎣 but if NO US AIRING? CASE DEAD ON ARRIVAL ⚰️😭 – FCC coming up EMPTY HANDED 🤲!'

BBC STONEWALLING 🧱😶: 'Nothing new, fam!' FCC/NPR/PBS ghosting but LETTER OUT 📰📤. AUNTIE BBC regulated by OFCOM 🇬🇧👮‍♂️ not FCC DADDIES 🇺🇸 – TRUMP'S REVENGE ARC GOING BRRRR 😤🔥 but probs FIZZLES like bad fireworks 🎆💥! WALL STREET BETS on LAWSUIT ORGY? Nah, just BBC SWEATING 😰💦 while DONNIE THRUSTS to VICTORY 🏆🍆! 😂🤡🇺🇸🇬🇧
